name: ACHIEVEMENT_CAMPAIGN_HISTORICAL_BATTLES_COMPLETE
description: Complete all Historical Battles in single player.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_WOLOLO
description: Convert 1,000 units.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_UNEXPECTED
description: Convert 100 units using Spanish Missionaries.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_LOSING_YOUR_RELIGION
description: Convert an enemy Monk.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_CHAIN_REACTION
description: Blow up an enemy Demolition Ship with a Demolition Ship of your own.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_KABOOM
description: Kill 1,000 enemy units using Demolition Ships.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_BULLS_EYE
description: Destroy a Trebuchet with another Trebuchet.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_NO_WONDER_LEFT_BEHIND
displayName: The Wonder, the Wonder, the...Oh, Never Mind
description: Prevent the Korean Wonder from being destroyed in the "Noryang Point (1598)" mission of the Historical Battles.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_CATHEDRAL_RUSH
description: Convert the Cathedral in Milan without acquiring a single Villager in the third Barbarossa mission "Pope and Antipope".

name: ACHIEVEMENT_NO_WONDER_ON_MY_WATCH
description: Destroy every enemy Wonder before it is completed in the sixth Attila the Hun mission "The Fall of Rome".

name: ACHIEVEMENT_DIPLOMACY_IS_FOR_THE_MEEK
description: Kill the Scythian Prince and defeat the Scythians in the first Attila the Hun mission "The Scourge of God".

name: ACHIEVEMENT_KUSHLUK_ASSASSINATION
description: Kill Kushluk before 20 minutes have elapsed in the second Genghis Khan mission "A Life of Revenge".

name: ACHIEVEMENT_I_WAS_IN_CHINA_BEFORE
description: Defeat the Jin before they start constructing a Wonder in the third Genghis Khan mission "Into China".

name: ACHIEVEMENT_OFFENSE_IS_THE_BEST_DEFENSE
description: Defeat all opponents before constructing a Wonder in the sixth Saladin mission "The Lion and the Demon".

name: ACHIEVEMENT_THE_GO_GETTER
description: Defeat the Hungarians before Subotai has arrived in the sixth Genghis Khan mission "Pax Mongolica".

name: ACHIEVEMENT_FUROR_TEUTONICUS
description: Defeat all opponents instead of collecting the required Relics in the first Barbarossa mission "Holy Roman Emperor".

name: ACHIEVEMENT_ATTILA_SPEED_RUN
description: Defeat all opponents before 30 minutes have elapsed in the fifth Attila the Hun mission "The Catalaunian Fields".

name: ACHIEVEMENT_HOT_N_SPICY
description: Prevent Tabasco from being defeated in the third Montezuma mission "Quetzalcoatl".

name: ACHIEVEMENT_BATTLESHIP
description: Win the Historical Battle "Lepanto (1571)" without allowing any Turkish Transport Ship to unload on your shores.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_SURYAVARMAN_RELICS
description: Collect all Relics on the map in the fifth Suryavarman mission "Nirvanapada".

name: ACHIEVEMENT_THE_MISSIONARY
description: Collect all Relics in the first El Cid mission "Brother Against Brother".

name: ACHIEVEMENT_OTTOMAN_GLORY_SEEKER
description: Win "Bapheus (1302)" by defeating Turkish factions without allying with them in single player.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_NO_HOJO
description: Win "Kurikara (1183)" without forming an alliance with the Hojo clan in single player.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_FIRE_WITH_FIRE
description: Amass 10 Condottieri, 10 Genoese Crossbowmen, and 10 Bombard Cannons in the fifth Dracula mission "The Night Falls".

name: ACHIEVEMENT_DESTROY_DELHI
description: Conquer Delhi at least 5 minutes before the timer expires in the fourth Tamerlane mission "Sultan of Hindustan".

name: ACHIEVEMENT_KILL_KING_TAKAYUTPI
description: Kill King Takayutpi before 5 minutes have elapsed in the first Bayinnaung mission "The Burmese Tigers".

name: ACHIEVEMENT_NO_KILLING_PORTUGUESE
displayName: Friends, Countrymen, Lend Me Your Ears
description: Convert Afonso de Albuquerque without killing a single Portuguese unit in the fifth Francisco de Almeida mission "A Son's Blood".

name: ACHIEVEMENT_NUMBERS_BEAT_EVERYTHING
displayName: Numerous As the Grains of Sand
description: Win the second Alaric mission "Razing Hellas" while training no military units aside from infantry.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_ALARIC_SPEED_RUN
displayName: Rome Was Destroyed in One Day
description: Destroy all Roman Castles before 30 minutes have elapsed in the fourth Alaric mission "The Giant Falls".

name: ACHIEVEMENT_DRAGON_SHIPS
description: Purchase 20 Dragon Ships in the Historical Battle "Lake Poyang (1363)".

name: ACHIEVEMENT_100_GBETO
displayName: With the Help of My Sisters
description: Amass an army of at least 100 Gbeto Warriors in the fourth Sundjata mission "Blood on the River Bank".

name: ACHIEVEMENT_SATANS_MAP
description: Win the fifth Sundjata mission "The Lion's Den" on Hard difficulty.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_NO_SUPPORT
displayName: An Army Marches on Its Stomach
description: Complete all secondary objectives and destroy all of Dagnajan's smaller bases before Dagnajan and his army march in the third Yodit mission "A Fallen Crown".

name: ACHIEVEMENT_RUSH_TO_THE_KING
description: Reach the King before 10 minutes have elapsed in the second Gajah Mada mission "Unconditional Loyalty".

name: ACHIEVEMENT_NOT_THE_VIPER
description: Win without losing any of your four heroes in the fifth Le Loi mission "A Three-Pronged Attack".

name: ACHIEVEMENT_NO_CASTLE_AGE
description: Win the second Kotyan mission "The Battle at the Kalka River" without advancing to the Castle Age.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_DEFEAT_AUSTRIAN_DUKE
description: Assist King Bela and defeat the Austrian Duke Frederick in the fifth Kotyan mission "A New Home" before 45 minutes have elapsed.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_NO_WALLS
description: Successfully defend Cuzco without constructing any new walls or gates in the second Pachacuti mission "The Field of Blood".

name: ACHIEVEMENT_D_DAY
description: Destroy an enemy Transport Ship with a Demolition Ship.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_ETERNAL_GRATITUDE

name: ACHIEVEMENT_CASTLE_CRUSHER
